author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam welcomes back to the cave Sophy Wong, designer and fabricator of amazing original fantasy spacesuits! Sophy brings her latest spacesuit to share the design brief for this costume, show how she blended scratch building with functional electronics, and explain why green is such a challenging base color for a spacesuit!

Find more of Sophy's projects at: https://sophywong.com/ and https://www.instagram.com/sophywongmakes/ Sophy's Spacesuit 2: https://sophywong.com/work/spacesuit2-75tj2

Shot and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: The Fantasy Spacesuits of Sophy Wong!
